item.title: There is blocked paving across the road. The brickwork has sunk near the central divider line. Causes car to violently shake as impossible to avoid with incoming traffic, 4th November
item.description:
As this is a featured block paving across the road it is easily found. There is a similar area nearer turn into Golden Arrow way which has already been repaired (poorly with Tarmac rather than restore the blockwork)
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lobleys Drive, Hucclecote, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
